body:
Hello @stijnvanhoey! Thanks for updating the PR.

 - In the file [`pandas/core/indexes/base.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/b32b4165e4c988ea67370ed1e03cdd10e758c6e2/pandas/core/indexes/base.py), following are the PEP8 issues :
